TopicTitle: Almost two hours of GoPro footage from ISS EVA 30 and 31

Articles.Content:
Well, if this isn't the best footage of anything from orbit ever, please, please, please show me something better.

https://archive.org/details/EVAGoPro#

You can download them in MPEG2 format for 1080p quality.
This is incredibly cool, thank you for sharing
